help: Page dump is shown in report if enabled. Default is false.
If set to false, this will not generate any report. Default is true.

step: |New email wait condition |From:value@value.com,Subject:You have new notifications,SubjectContains:You have|
help: This is the condition to be checked while waiting for new email. You can have one or multiple conditions separated by comma.
This determines what should be done to the email after reading. Options are : DELETE, READ, NONE
